attributes.action: Request the Treasury Select Committee investigate the reason for the high number of complaints made to the OFT, FSA and FOS in connection with the debt collection tactics of MBNA Europe Bank Ltd.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The consumer action forums show that many clients of MBNA Europe Bank Ltd are sent post-contract information that is late or insufficient under the terms of the license granted by the OFT. The consumers are being forced to organise themselves since the OFT is clearly swamped with other matters. We request the FSA use its powers to invite the clients of MBNA to provide witness statements detailing MBNA failures to report and any harassment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
